subject: Education
title: The Digital Divide: Who Gets Left Behind
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Digital Divide: Who Gets Left Behind.

hook.text: During COVID lockdowns, some kids Zoomed from home offices. Others shared one phone in a parking lot.

buildup.text: The digital divide isn't just about device accessâ€”it's about bandwidth, skills, and support.

discovery.text: Low-income students lost months of learning during online schooling; wealthy students often gained.

twist.text: Providing devices without internet, digital skills training, and parental support widens the gap.

climax.text: Digital equity requires infrastructure, affordability, literacy, and meaningful contentâ€”not just hardware.

punchline.text: Technology only equalizes education when access is truly equal.

quiz.question: What does the digital divide include beyond device access?
options: Bandwidth, digital skills, parental support, and meaningful content
